member.summary: Chunk an ingestion document into smaller pieces.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunker.Chunk(DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.IngestionDocument)
member.summary: Chunk an ingestion document into smaller pieces synchronously.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.MaxChunkSize
member.summary: Maximum number of characters per chunk. Default is 1000.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.ChunkOverlap
member.summary: Number of overlapping characters between chunks. Default is 100.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.PreserveParagraphs
member.summary: Whether to preserve paragraph boundaries during chunking. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.IncludeHeaderContext
member.summary: Whether to include header context in chunks. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.HeaderContextSeparator
member.summary: Separator to use between header context and content. Default is ": ".

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.PreserveElementMetadata
member.summary: Whether to include metadata from source elements. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.UseQuarksIfAvailable
member.summary: Whether to use DocumentAtom quarks if available. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.MinChunkSize
member.summary: Minimum chunk size to produce. Chunks smaller than this will be merged with adjacent content. Default is 50.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.SplitSeparators
member.summary: Separator pattern to use when splitting text. Default splits on paragraphs.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.ForRag
member.summary: Create options optimized for RAG applications.

member.name: M:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Chunkers.AtomChunkerOptions.ForLargeContext
member.summary: Create options for large context windows.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Readers.AtomDocumentReaderOptions.PreserveFullAtomData
member.summary: Whether to preserve full serialized Atom data in element metadata. Enables lossless round-trip and advanced chunking. Default is true.

member.summary: Whether to extract text from images using OCR. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Readers.AtomDocumentReaderOptions.BuildHierarchy
member.summary: Whether to build document hierarchy from heading structure. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Readers.AtomDocumentReaderOptions.IncludeBinaryContent
member.summary: Whether to include binary content (images, attachments) in output. Default is true.

member.name: P:DocumentAtom.DataIngestion.Readers.AtomDocumentReaderOptions.MaxFileSizeBytes
member.summary: Maximum file size in bytes to process. 0 = unlimited. Default is 0 (unlimited).

member.summary: Custom processor settings by document type.

member.summary: Metadata keys to exclude from output.
